thread.title: Haricharan sings Kerala's ISL dedication song
thread.title_full: Haricharan sings Kerala's ISL dedication song - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Haricharan sings Kerala's ISL dedication song
text:
Popular South Indian playback singer, Haricharan will sing a dedication song in Malayalam for the 2015 Indian Super League, the football league. A peppy number composed by Nikhil R Nair and written by lyricist Manu Manjith mixed by Hari Shankar.
"The recording is done and we are busy with the shoot of its video. It will be shot across Kerala and will absorb God's Own Country's football spirit," says Nikhil.
